channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1511523959962931201
item.description: “Negative data (from experiments) gets thrown in the trash, but it has value” -@aryelipman on the value of open data marketplaces. @lab_dao LA meet up https://t.co/rQVR2aFpGu

item.title: #es @ 1511463567781945347
item.description:
El SERCOP, en el marco de su compromiso institucional para impulsar la utilización y reutilización de datos abiertos, invita a usted al Lanzamiento de la Datatón: “Rompiendo la Contratación Pública”.
📆 Jueves 7 de abril de 2022 ⏰ 11:00 FB Live: @SercopEcuador https://t.co/RNluxYqEw1

item.title: #de @ 1511442601756528659
item.description: die Bundesländer versuchen ihre Klage gegen mich damit zu begründen, dass sie besonders rückständig und ineffizient arbeiten und ihnen daher Aufwände entstanden seien #informationsfreiheit #opendata #urheberrecht https://t.co/uPwnljk2Tm

item.title: #pt @ 1511420971521036292
item.description:
Pela primeira vez, em 2022, a OKBR fará um ranking analisando a forma que as capitais do país disponibilizam dados abertos.
A nossa diretora-executiva @fecampa contou a novidade para o @ValorEconomico. 👇 https://t.co/zeAQCrl923

item.title: #en @ 1511410989823979521
item.description:
One of the most effective ways to use The #CoreVelocityBelt for P’s & H’s - Pull the player open
Data showed lower half actually open later, faster which is critical.
Special thanks to ⁦@browntown_vandy⁩ for suggesting we test - he’d seen the same effect with Vandy P’s https://t.co/Z3js9xLFHV

item.title: #es @ 1511410830537023491
item.description: 🧵 #COVID19mx Así la vacunación en México con base en cifras (no verificables con datos abiertos) de la @SSalud_mx : Solo 29% de la población está adecuadamente protegida (esquema completo + refuerzo) y 33% NO ha recibido NI UNA sola dosis, la mayoría menores de edad... https://t.co/UMwUSDFIRL

item.title: #en @ 1511388326544224260
item.description: At the @o_n_n Resource Centre, we know that data on nonprofits and charities is essential for understanding their social and economic impact. Dive into the challenges - and opportunities - for nonprofit data in Canada in this podcast from @MeanMedianMoose: https://t.co/bsWO4ZfrLt https://t.co/ac20cP2CoD

item.title: #de @ 1511380088096444416
item.description: In dem Fall konnte ich das Beweisen, weil ich die Rohdaten klauen konnte. Eigentlich sollte ich die aber nicht klauen müssen, sondern es sollte die als #OpenData Schnittstelle geben.

item.title: #de @ 1511379616849698817
item.description:
Der Fall zeigt gut, warum #OpenData statt Dashboards wichtig sind.
Regierungen haben Anreiz sich zu vermarkten. Deswegen bestehen Dashboards vom Bund nur aus Bullshit.
Auswertung solcher Daten ist Job von Journalist/Aktivist*innen und nicht der Marketingabteilung des @BMI_Bund.

item.title: #en @ 1511368857524580357
item.description: The much anticipated @GEDI_Knights gridded biomass product is out!! #OpenData https://t.co/8JUX4fkF4U

item.title: #en @ 1511367320144388105
item.description: Have you heard of Linked open data? Let Winifred Lamb tell you more. The journey to make this started back in 2012 @ #lawdi, then @ahrcpress funding in 2019 for @JWexlerBM #ceef3d and our #linkedislands network allowed us to make 2 animations with @TooTallPro. Here's one. Enjoy! https://t.co/6OLE1gJVS1

item.description: Hello #OpenData Twitter I have a question. If one was to outline entry level data stewardship course for PhD students/new postdocs what would you include? What are the essential skills/things to know? Pls retweet #OpenScience #FAIRdata #ResearchDataManagement #DataStewardship

item.title: #es @ 1511321320688082948
#en @ 1511320745250635788
item.description:
I cannot wait to see the first data from Australia's first #EarthObservation mission🛰️!
Similarly to the @CopernicusEU programme, the free and open data policy that will be adopted will certainly foster the development of new services for the #EO user community. https://t.co/Nnr3GI8cMZ

item.title: #en @ 1511316680554815495
item.description: The @ra_sverige #OAIPMH-server and @iiif_io presentation and image APIs are now available for all to use. For now they serve only metadata and images of archival documents that are free to reuse. Documentation in English here, https://t.co/5nWSRRQ8o4 #OpenGLAM #OpenData #IIIF https://t.co/H4oJr86ESu

item.title: #de @ 1511286821879271428
item.description:
Richtig und wichtig, was @raulde und Jannis @okfde hier erzählen.
Wir haben ein Recht auf Mobilität, wir finanzieren den ÖPNV – es geht nicht an, dass wir keine/kaum #OpenData dazu bekommen. Fahrpläne, Ausfälle, Verspätungen, Aufzüge in Echtzeit ... Wäre alles möglich! https://t.co/2WM5occY0r

item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1511196885125517317
item.description: This was my first ever open peer review for a platinum OA (free to publish free to view) software journal. Would do it again. You essentially collab with the author to improve the pub and code until it is ready to publish. I feel like part of the team. That's how it should be. https://t.co/I6BwRNLogM

item.title: #es @ 1511194798828359684
item.description: Ahí andaremos en compartiendo herramientas de apertura. item.title: #es @ 1511166007502639111
item.description:
#LOULTIMO 🇵🇪 Tuvieron que pasar 719 días para que el Perú reporte por debajo 1,200 hospitalizados por #COVID19 a nivel nacional: 1,197 ➡️tal cifra representa el 13% del total de 9,056 camas disponibles.
Fuente: #DatosAbiertos SuSalud https://t.co/DDrvsGFtqH

item.title: #en @ 1511078979482046465
item.description: browsing charlottesville's open data portal - nearly 11% of all arrests made by CPD in the last 5 years (the entire period the data covers) were for public intoxication. in most cases, it's the only crime charged at the time of arrest. https://t.co/K8ZO6BlT3B

item.description: What are your favorite examples of *open data* that can be *analyzed with computational models*? I’m teaching a class on model fitting in psychology, and would love to expose students to behavioral models & datasets beyond those from my research. @OpenAcademics RT plz!

item.title: #es @ 1510754033606217731
item.description:
Cada vez más cerca a CERO📉
#LoUltimo La Villa Panamericana registra 23 pacientes hospitalizados por #COVID19 : Es la cifra más baja tras 68 semanas desde el 12/12/2020
Tal cantidad representa una reducción del 99% de la máxima ocupación de 2,158 del 19/01/2022
#DatosAbiertos
